title: Israel's new plan is to 'shrink,' not solve, the Palestinian conflict ...
htmlTitle: Israel's new plan is to 'shrink,' not solve, the Palestinian conflict ...
snippet: Sep 16, 2021 ... Tel Aviv (CNN) The new Israeli government that toppled long-serving Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu this summer is full of contradictions.
htmlSnippet: Sep 16, 2021 ... Tel Aviv (CNN) The new Israeli government that toppled long-serving Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu this summer is full of contradictions.

metatags.og:description: The new Israeli government that toppled long-serving Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu this summer is full of contradictions. There's pro-peace leftists, pro-settlement right-wingers, pragmatic centrists and even for the first time an Arab Islamist party, all sitting together in one governing coalition. On the most divisive issue -- the Israeli-Palestinian conflict -- there is almost no consensus, which is just how Micah Goodman likes it.
metatags.twitter:title: Israel's new plan is to 'shrink,' not solve, the Palestinian conflict. Here's what that looks like
metatags.author: Neri Zilber
metatags.og:title: Israel's new plan is to 'shrink,' not solve, the Palestinian conflict. Here's what that looks like

title: Netanyahu's reign is over for now. He leaves behind a wealthier ...

snippet: Jun 14, 2021 ... Jerusalem (CNN) He's been dubbed King Bibi, the magician, the great ... Without question, Netanyahu has left an indelible mark on Israel, ...
htmlSnippet: Jun 14, 2021 ... Jerusalem (CNN) He's been dubbed King Bibi, the magician, the great ... Without question, Netanyahu has left an indelible mark on Israel, ...

metatags.og:description: To supporters, Benjamin Netanyahu is the tireless protector of modern-day Israel who helped turn the small nation into an economic powerhouse with outsized global influence. To critics, he's a divider who helped destroy democratic institutions while enabling the rise of extremists.
metatags.twitter:title: As Netanyahu's reign ends, he leaves behind a wealthier, more divided Israel and a stalled peace process
metatags.author: Analysis by Hadas Gold, CNN
